attributes.action: MPs who were ordered to pay back expenses should be evicted
attributes.additional_details: Strong sentences have been handed down to those found guilty of looting, some families of those found guilty are being forced out of their homes, Some MPs falsely claimed many thousands of pounds on expenses for 2nd homes, many then "flipped" the properties to further exploit the system, it's only fair that these homes should be confiscated and sold with the money going back into government funds
